item.description:
We are planning a meeting of the minds where several area Ron Paul Meetup Groups will get together to brainstorm ways we can pool our efforts to more effectively campaign for a win for Ron Paul in the NH Republican primary.

Veteran campaigner Jared Chicoine, who has been selected by the national HQ to head up efforts in New Hampshire, will be joining us.

http://blog.4presiden...

IMPORTANT! We will be meeting afterhours at a privately owned small business. Seating will be limited. If you can bring a chair in case we run out, that would be most appreciated!

MAP: For some reason the Meetup board is not showing the correct location of the print shop. Here is a Google map that is accurate...

http://maps.google.co...
item.name: Meet Jared Chicoine
